channel.title: Commercial Space on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Commercial Space on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump orders cull of regulations governing commercial rocket launches
item.description: The head of the FAA’s commercial spaceflight division will become a political appointee.

item.title: Australia’s first orbital-class rocket stalled seconds after liftoff
item.description: “I thought best case was maybe 40 seconds of flight time, but I’ll take 14 as a win.”

item.title: Amazon’s ride on the rocket merry-go-round continues with SpaceX launch
item.description: Amazon has launched 78 of its planned 3,232 Kuiper broadband satellites.
